english.segment2: Jesus precious Jesus. Rescued me rescued me. Jesus precious Jesus. Now I'm free because You rescued me
english.segment4: You came to me. With open Arms paid the price. Now I see. In troubled times. In troubled times I will see the light. When I'm lost when I'm lost. You're the Path lead me on. In You I see. In You I see all that I can be
english.segment7: Yes I'll sing to the One. To the One Who has saved me
